level.heading: DUTIES OF OFFICERS OF THE BOARD (ยง 30-102)

level.text: The Chairperson’s duties shall be as follows:
Act as official spokesperson for the Board; Provided, that the Chairperson shall represent the position of the Board as established by a majority of the Board;
Preside at all meetings of the Board;

Appoint the chairperson and members of ad hoc committees established by the Board. The Chairperson shall not serve as the chairperson of any ad hoc committee, but may be a member of each ad hoc committee with a right to vote;
Co-sign contracts with the Treasurer unless the signing of contracts is delegated to the Executive Director; and
Co-sign checks in excess of five hundred dollars ($500) with the Executive Director in accordance with D.C. Official Code ยง 3-1312.
The Vice Chairperson’s duties shall be as follows:
Assume the duties of the Chairperson in the absence of the Chairperson or at the request of the Chairperson.
Co-sign contracts with the Chairperson in the absence of the Treasurer.
